observe.name: Observe [SOC/MEN AWR]
observe.description: Observe an enemy, zone, or element in the battlefield. Information learned depends on check's result.

swapWeapons.name: Swap Weapons
swapWeapons.description: Change your equipped weapon/s. The weapon/s you equip must be accessible from your inventory or in the same zone as you.

performSkill.name: Perform Skill
performSkill.description: Perform a learned combat skill that's specified to be used as a Minor Action.

useItem.name: Use Item
useItem.description: Use an item in your inventory that's specified to be used as a Minor Action.

weaponMeleeAttack.name: Weapon/Melee Attack [PHYS PROW]
weaponMeleeAttack.description: Attack a target in the same zone as you with an equipped weapon.

aetherRangedAttack.name: Aether/Ranged Attack [MEN PROW]
aetherRangedAttack.description: Spend an aether die to attack a target that you can see.

performSkill.name: Perform Skill
performSkill.description: Perform a learned combat skill that's specified to be used as an Action.

useItem.name: Use Item
useItem.description: Use an accessible item in your inventory or in the same zone as you that's specified to be used as an Action.

objective.name: Accomplish Objective
objective.description: Perform an action that increases your progress gauge for the scene.

other.name: Other
other.description: Improvised action that the GM approves of.

move.name: Move
move.description: Move to a zone that you can see.
notes: Moving into a zone with an enemy or through an obstacle stops your movement.
Restrictions may be applied or removed depending on the situation.

intercept.name: Intercept
intercept.description: Prevent your target from taking the Move Maneuver until the end of the round for as long as they are in the same zone as you.

flank.name: Flank
flank.description: Mark your target as Flanked until the end of the round for as long as they are in the same zone as you. An ally attacking the Flanked target recieves a bonus for each time the target was Flanked.
notes: You do not benefit from your own Flank Maneuver.

defend.name: Defend
defend.description: Until the end of the round, temporarily gain a 1d4 defense die which you can spend in place of an aether die when defending against an attack.
notes: Can only be used when no enemy is in the same zone as you.
